title: What's an Accountant?
creator_credit: Neil McClure, CPA Australia and Production Group
brief_description: Tania Lacey introduces a program designed to encourage viewers to consider the possibility of a career in accounting. Discusses common sterotypes of accountants, the prerequisites for an accountancy career and the diverse range of employment opportunities. Wherever you may wish to work - “Accountancy can take you there!”
